name: Potions, Scrolls, and Hell demo
description:
Potions, Scrolls, and Hell is a roguelike game being developed in RPG Maker MV.  This is the demo, a (hopefully) functional smaller version of the full game. It contains 3 dungeon levels, 2 genders, 3 classes, several items, random item and enemy generation, and more!

Just download the .zip,  open it, and you should get the app.

If it doesn't work, let me know!

I'm not going to include any instructions, as I think part of the fun of this game is figuring it all out for yourself.

Have fun!
